title: PLEASE FIX TROLLING SUPPORT ISSUE
body: This is probably the most beneficial thing to do.... If a user gets put in support only allow him to pick support champs. DONT ALLOW HIM ACCESSS to all champs..... trolling must stop

replies.body:
Heres a crazy idea.  If you dont want non-supps to be your support. how about you start MAINING support, that way there is no "off support support".

If you cant handle it, for any reason, why should you limit the team mate?  If he is good, then fine its a good pick.  If he is not a good support at the end of the game, take the time to explain to him/her (NICELY) how they could have been a better support.

No, fuck that. Nobody else needs to suffer because you are a salty little shit of a bronze ADC and cant handle people playing anything other than Janna.

Riot has also declared they are never going to enforce a stagnant meta.

Just for entertainment value, what do you consider a 'troll support"? Your match history shows perfectly normal supports going back a dozen or so games.
Anyone who wasn't built as a support champion... PLAY YOUR POSITION not what you want because you got forced into support and didnt want too.

Hahaha...you are the same kind of person who throws a fit, and then throws the game when you get a support that doesnt meet your "criteria" right?

I don't play support, but when I get autofilled I either choose Ahri or Illaoi, maybe the occasional Garen. I know I am no god tier support, but I do just fine. 

Tell me, whats wrong with that?

No. In the game supports don’t play a huge role in kills, if they can do the key factor of the role which is vision then they aren’t trolling the adc is trolling if he/she can’t adapt to the support. Stop making supports your slaves, they are players and deserve the same chance in killing enemies you do.
you can kill people.... zyra, lux, bard.... there are offensive supports

The thing is it’s nit what’s support can kill. It’s the fact they are told “Don't TAKE THE KILL” don’t take farm. Just poke and ward like what are you gonna make them do st the point where ether the support player is now gonna do what your saying and not enjoy it thus not being effective enough or they are going to break the rules so they can enjoy the role. In better terms it’s what the adcs want the supports to do but this isn’t really a job it’s littlery being a slave, thus you see it in front as not so many people play support b/c they don’t want to do boring things such as warding and going out of their way to get an adc a lead.

Picking Kayle support isnt trolling. Its off meta, but NOT trolling. Its a legitimate pick.

Edit:
Also whats really not helping your case is the fact that she had the highest vision score in the match, (finished her t2 warding item first too) a better KDA (her 58% KP to your 55%, AND with 6 less deaths) then you did, and was only 546 gold lower then you, which is a serious problem being that youre a solomid.
Im not a solo mid player. i played all positions and never once picked out of position to ruin 30 min of my teams time.

Solomid = you played your champion alone into the midlane. 

You had the luxury to CS in your lane, but she made almost as much gold as you did, despite only getting around 1-2 coins from minions per wave. Thats a serious problem because you have all your farm available to you.

if you feel your support is being too agro for you tell them nicely or vice versa. if they're a good support they'll listen and probably try their best to adapt, if you're a good teammate you'll ask respectfully and if they struggle to change you will understand and not rage out. 

examples of being nice when asking, "hey, do you mind if we play more passive for a bit", "can you please try not to hit the minions as much, it's throwing off my cs a bit", "please try to save your ultimate for my ganks if you can",  "try to save mana for fights if you can :)" ect ect

I dont care if a support is agro or passive... I care that someone picks out of position... Support champs have abilities to support... other champs don't it causes an unfair advantage that the other team gets.... A fed adc is the most terrifying thing in the game...
